package.name: brand-names
package.author: Joshua Hall
package.description: Automatically capitalize common brand and product names.
package.title: Brand Names

manifest.name: brand-names
manifest.title: Brand Names
manifest.description: Automatically capitalize common brand and product names.
manifest.author: Joshua Hall

value.readme:
# Espanso Accented Words

Simple package to extend [Espanso](https://espanso.org) with some brand and product names correctly capitalized.

## Installation

```
espanso install brand-names
```

## Usage

Type the brand name, and it'll appropriately capitalize. This leverages the `propagate_case` to carry through ALL CAPS if needed.

Here are a few examples...

* wikipedia > Wikipedia
* wordpress > WordPress
* greenfax > GreenFax
* fastspring > FastSpring
* evernote > Evernote
* bitcan > BitCan

## Contributions

Contributions are welcome. Feel free to fork and submit PRs with additional words to add to this list. This is far from an exhaustive list.

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# Brand Names

matches:
  - trigger: "1password"
    replace: "1Password"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true

  - trigger: "autocad"
    replace: "AutoCAD"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true

  - trigger: "autodesk"
    replace: "Autodesk"
    propagate_case: true
    word: true
